mod.description: A mod that replaces Spore's default idle animation (barring Creature/Tribal Stages) with a variety of other animations. Effects primarily the Galactic Adventures player captain and the Hologram Scout in Space Stage.

component.description: Default version of the mod. Replaces the standard 'lookaround' idle animation with a range of others.
Removes idle animations from the player character and does not replace them. Good option for taking screenshots in-game.
